components.description:
A person in the process of getting their hair cut, with scissors shown open next to the hair on their head.

While no gender is specified, many early designs displayed this emoji as a woman.

Windows previously displayed this emoji as a comb and scissors, instead of a person having their hair cut.
components.title: Haircut

description:
A person in the process of getting their hair cut, with scissors shown open next to the hair on their head.

While no gender is specified, many early designs displayed this emoji as a woman.

Windows previously displayed this emoji as a comb and scissors, instead of a person having their hair cut.
title: Haircut

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Personal care symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A person in the process of getting their hair cut. This emoji is intended to be gender-neutral, but isÂ commonly shown asÂ a girl or woman smi http://emojipedia.org/haircut/
emoji_net_data.name: person getting haircut

bn:00102884a: Of, relating to, or denoting the sex which is generally characterized as the one associated with the larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces fertilizable gametes (ova) from which offspring develop
Belonging to the sex with larger, fertilizable gametes.

Belonging to the sex which typically produces eggs, which in humans and most other mammals is typically the one which has XX chromosomes; belonging to the sex which has larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).

bn:00083111v: Perform the services of a barber: cut the hair and/or beard of
To cut the hair or beard of (a person).

bn:00060209n: An edge tool having two crossed pivoting blades
A tool used for cutting thin material, consisting of two crossing blades attached at a pivot point in such a way that the blades slide across each other when the handles are closed.

bn:00008534n: Person whose occupation is mainly to cut, dress, groom, style and shave males' hair
A barber is a person whose occupation is mainly to cut, dress, groom, style and shave men's and boys' hair.
Barbers are persons whose occupation is to cut any type of hair, and to shave or trim the beards of men.
The trade of and practice of shaving and cutting hair.
Person whose job is to treat the hair style of other people.
A hairdresser who cuts hair and shaves beards as a trade

bn:00020483n: The act or service of cutting hair
The act or process of styling hair
Styling of hair, usually on the human scalp
The occupation of cutting and arrangement of hair to create an attractive presentation.
A hairstyle, hairdo, or haircut refers to the styling of hair, usually on the human scalp.
The arrangement of the hair (especially a woman's hair)
A style of fashion of wearing the hair.
The style in which someone's hair has been cut and arranged.

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00034453n: A young female human; (in contrast to boy), a female child or young adult.
A title of respect for a young woman (usually unmarried) with or without a name used.
A young female person, usually a child or teenager.
A girl is any female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.
A girl is a female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.

bn:00042550n: Someone who cuts or beautifies hair
A hairdresser is a person whose occupation is to cut or style hair in order to change or maintain a person's image.
Person whose occupation is to cut or style hair
Person whose job is to treat the hair style of other people.
A person who cuts or styles hair as an occupation or profession.

bn:00042548n: The way someone's hair is cut.
The style in which hair has been cut

bn:00049666n: A polite name for any woman

bn:00042526n: A covering for the body (or parts of it) consisting of a dense growth of threadlike structures (as on the human head); helps to prevent heat loss
Hair is a protein filament that grows from follicles found in the dermis, or skin.
Hair is a collection of biological filaments that grows from follicles on the skin.
Filamentous biomaterial that grows from follicles found in the dermis
The collection or mass of filaments growing from the skin of humans and animals, and forming a covering for a part of the head or for any part or the whole body.
The collection or mass of filaments growing from the skin of humans and animals.
The collection or mass of such growths growing from the skin of humans and animals, and forming a covering for a part of the head or for any part or the whole body.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person getting a haircut emoji captures a moment of personal grooming with a clean, modern aesthetic. The person, depicted with smooth, rounded features and soft gradients, sits calmly as a pair of scissors, rendered with realistic lighting and a metallic sheen, snip away at their hair. This emoji, with its subtle expression and clear action, represents transformation, self-care, or a fresh start, all brought to life with Apple's signature 3D design.
